TORMExceptionHandler Methods

Methods
 NameDescription
GetAdapterException(Exception,string)

Returns specific exception instance for given (adapter/driver specific) exception or nil if given exception is not adapter specific and is considered a generic failure in which case the original exception is propagated. The returned instance is raised as outer exception.

HandleException(string)

Handles current exception and converts it to ORM specific one.
